>>> create.adoc
= watch create
:generator!:

<<< create.adoc.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
		<meta name="theme-color" content="#375EAB">
		<title>watch create</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="">
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="topbar">
			<div class="container">
				<div class="top-heading">
					<a href="/">watch create</a>
				</div>
				<div class="menu">
					<form class="item" action="/_internal/search">
						<input type="text" name="q" placeholder="Search" />
					</form>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="page">
			<div class="container">
<div id="header">
<h1>watch create</h1>
</div>
<div id="content">
</div>
<div id="footer">

>>> update.adoc
# watch updated
:generator!:
:keywords: ciigo,asciidoc
:stylesheet: /path/to/style.css

Hello, body.

<<< update.adoc.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
		<meta name="theme-color" content="#375EAB">
		<meta name="keywords" content="ciigo,asciidoc">
		<title>watch updated</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="/path/to/style.css">
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="topbar">
			<div class="container">
				<div class="top-heading">
					<a href="/">watch updated</a>
				</div>
				<div class="menu">
					<form class="item" action="/_internal/search">
						<input type="text" name="q" placeholder="Search" />
					</form>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="page">
			<div class="container">
<div id="header">
<h1>watch updated</h1>
</div>
<div id="content">
<div class="paragraph">
<p>Hello, body.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div id="footer">

>>> create.md
---
Title: a title
---
# watch create

<<< create.md.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
		<meta name="theme-color" content="#375EAB">
		<title>a title</title>
		<style>
		body{}
		</style>
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="topbar">
			<div class="container">
				<div class="top-heading">
					<a href="/">a title</a>
				</div>
				<div class="menu">
					<form class="item" action="/_internal/search">
						<input type="text" name="q" placeholder="Search" />
					</form>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="page">
			<div class="container">
<h1>watch create</h1>

			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="footer">

>>> update.md
---
Title: A new title
stylesheet: /path/to/style.css
keywords: ciigo,markdown
---
# watch updated

<<< update.md.html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
		<meta name="theme-color" content="#375EAB">
		<meta name="keywords" content="ciigo,markdown">
		<title>A new title</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="/path/to/style.css">
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="topbar">
			<div class="container">
				<div class="top-heading">
					<a href="/">A new title</a>
				</div>
				<div class="menu">
					<form class="item" action="/_internal/search">
						<input type="text" name="q" placeholder="Search" />
					</form>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="page">
			<div class="container">
<h1>watch updated</h1>

			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="footer">
